name: Weeping Cradle

desc.0: A special W-Engine with multiple layers embedded inside. It contains a special Ether charging layer that can quickly recharge special-model Bangboo and custom-made combat equipment. Even though this W-Engine looks like a cruel confinement chamber, Rina's Bangboo seem to enjoy sneaking in there to recharge their batteries. They even treat resting inside as a cozy reward.

desc2: Equip to increase Support Agents' combat capabilities

phaseDescs: While off-field, the equipper's Energy Regen increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>0.6</ct>/s. Attacks from the equipper enhance the squad's DMG against a struck target by <ct color=#2BAD00>10%</ct> for 3 seconds.
